radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver appears normal in echotexture and size without focal lesion. There is no evidence of intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary dilatation. The gallbladder contains multiple mobile shadowing gallstones with no evidence of gallbladder distention, gallbladder wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid. The spleen measures 13.8 cm, top-normal in size, and has homogeneous echotexture. The right kidney measures 11.8 cm. Visualized portions of the aorta and IVC are normal.
